 ```

 ```

 ```bash
-$ curl -s https://static.rust-lang.org/rustup.sh | sudo sh -s -- --channel=nightly
+$ curl -s https://static.rust-lang.org/rustup.sh | sh -s -- --channel=nightly
 ```
